description:
My name is Alessia.
I was born and grown in Brindisi, at the age of 19 I moved to the North of Italy to start my University career @Polytechnic University of Turin, at first in Biomedical Engineering and, after realizing that coding was my real passion, in Computer Engineering.
I interrupted my studies for a while to move to Ireland, where I worked for about 2 years, lately as a Web Implementation Specialist for the Google Tag Team in Dublin.
This January I came back to Italy in order to finish my studies and hopefully land my first job as a Software Engineer!

As I said I really love everything related with programming, Web Development in particular.

projects.name: Local Weather
projects.description: Web page that shows the weather in the current location, returning it via FreeCodeCamp Api.

projects.name: Pomodoro Clock
projects.description: Timer that allows to alternate study sessions and breaks.

projects.name: React Calculator
projects.description: Calculator that handles the 4 standard operations (sum, subtraction, division, multiplication) for both integers and floating-point numbers.

projects.name: Random Quote Machine
projects.description: Web page that returns via API from 'Quotes on Design' a series of random quotes. They can be shared on Twitter clicking on the related Button.

projects.name: Markdown Previewer
projects.description: Responsive web page that allow to Markdown the content inserted in the editor and visualize it in the Preview Container.
This was my first project. I tried to replicate a game that my father plays on paper.
